import React from'react';import Typed from'react-typed';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-blue-800 fixed top-0 w-full z-10 py-4 pr-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-white text-xl font-roboto ml-48",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typed,{strings:['Official Tweets Analysis','Sentiment Analysis Dashboard'],typeSpeed:40,loop:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"italic text-white text-sm float-right",children:getDate()})]});}function getDate(){var today=new Date();var dd=String(today.getDate()).padStart(2,'0');var mm=String(today.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0');//January is 0!
